items.title: UK, France and Germany ready to reimpose sanctions on Iran over nuclear programme
items.description: If Iran does not re-engage in talks by the end of the month, sanctions will be reinstated, the E3 says.

items.title: Macron admits French repression in Cameroon's independence struggle
items.description: French leader cites independence icons who were killed during military operations led by French forces.

items.title: The row over 'vote theft' that has shaken Indian politics
items.description: Opposition parties have made allegations of electoral irregularities, which the India's poll body has denied.

items.title: Israel bombards Gaza City as UK and allies demand action against 'unfolding famine'
items.description: The countries demanded "immediate, permanent and concrete steps" to facilitate the entry of aid to Gaza.

items.title: Why are Trump and Putin meeting in Alaska and when will it happen?
items.description: Trump says he will meet with the Russian leader in the "great state of Alaska".
